aka: Out of the Way! (Stones Are Falling Here)

cast.name: 米凯尔·盖洛瓦尼 Mikheil Gelovani

writer.name: 米哈依尔·齐阿乌列里 Mikheil Chiaureli

director.name: 米哈依尔·齐阿乌列里 Mikheil Chiaureli

trans_title: Out of the Way! (Stones Are Falling Here)
introduction: When the communists decide to renovate the city and try to demolish a badly positioned church, the religious citizens decide to fight for what is holy to them.Set in Tbilisi, Khabarda is a satire that plays on the tension between petit bourgeois values and the incoming sweep of Communist ideology. The film was immediately criticized for elements that were insensitive to Georgian culture. However, Chiaureli's contributions to both radical film style and the expressive pictorial quality of socialist cinema, with films like Saba and Khabarda, remain impressive.
